scripts.build: npm run clean && babel ./ --out-dir build --ignore node_modules && npm run build-lang && cp -r static build && cp -r lang build
scripts.build-prod: npm run build && npm run build-next
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build-next && NODE_ENV=production PORT=9000 pm2 start build/index.js
scripts.restart: npm run build-prod && pm2 restart index
scripts.watch: node_modules/.bin/babel-watch -w index.js -w database -w routes -w util.js -w socket-anti-spam.js --disable-autowatch index.js
scripts.eslint-check: eslint actions components database pages reducers routes scripts index.js store.js util.js
scripts.eslint-fix: eslint actions components database pages reducers routes scripts index.js store.js util.js --fix
